pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Estimation of the Most Likely Drug Combination using Smooth Algorithm // A flexible moving average algorithm for modeling drug exposure in pharmacoepidemiology studies as presented in the article: Ouchi, D., Giner-Soriano, M., Gmez- Lumbreras, A., Vedia Urgell, C.,Torres, F., Morros, R. (2022). "Automatic Estimation of the Most Likely Drug Combination in Electronic Health Records Using the Smooth Algorithm : Development and Validation Study." JMIR medical informatics, 10(11), e37976. doi:10.2196/37976.
